## Greenentre4future
### Description

The GreenEntre4Future project aims to involve and train Youth Workers through the following objectives:
Define sustainable development approaches;
Develop and share tools to empower youth;
Train youth workers;
To promote initiatives for the European climate legislation;
To create synergy among stakeholders.
They propose a MOOC (Massive Open Online Course) to lead youth in green market to seize job opportunities and to create synergies and collaboration in green sector.
